statements: SELECT ticket_id, event_name, ticket_price, sale_date FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY ticket_id ASC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, sale_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price >= 50.00 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE event_name LIKE '%concert%';
SELECT ticket_id as ID, event_name as Event, ticket_price as Price FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY Price DESC, sale_date ASC;
SELECT ticket_id, event_name, ticket_price, sale_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT COUNT(ticket_id) AS total_tickets, AVG(ticket_price) AS avg_price FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY event_name;
SELECT DISTINCT event_name, MAX(ticket_price) AS highest_price FROM ticket_sales GROUP BY event_name HAVING highest_price > 100;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY event_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, sale_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM event_data WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT event_name, revenue FROM event_data WHERE ticket_sold > 1000;
SELECT ticket_id, event_name, ticket_price, sale_date FROM ticket_sales;
SELECT event_id, event_name, revenue, event_date FROM event_data;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, sale_date, ticket_id FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, revenue, event_date FROM event_data WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price, sale_date, ticket_id FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT event_name, sale_date FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_category FROM popular_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM ticket_sales WHERE sale_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT event_name, total_revenue FROM ticket_sales JOIN revenue_reports ON ticket_sales.ticket_id = revenue_reports.report_id;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM popular_events WHERE event_category = 'Music' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ticket_sales JOIN popular_events ON ticket_sales.event_name = popular_events.event_name WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT event_name, event_category, total_revenue FROM popular_events JOIN ticket_sales JOIN revenue_reports ON popular_events.event_id = ticket_sales.ticket_id = revenue_reports.report_id;
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM events WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM events WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS number_of_tickets FROM tickets GROUP BY event_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_data->'$.status' = 'completed';
SELECT event_name, event_date, ticket_price FROM events WHERE event_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, ticket_price FROM tickets WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT event_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM revenue GROUP BY event_name ORDER BY total_revenue DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date, report_data FROM reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND report_data ->> 'category' = 'sales' ORDER BY report_date DESC;

SELECT e.event_name, t.customer_name, r.revenue_amount FROM events e JOIN tickets t ON e.event_id = t.event_id JOIN revenue r ON r.event_id = e.event_id WHERE r.revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY r.revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales;
SELECT event_name, ticket_price FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT event_name, revenue, event_date FROM EventRevenue ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_name, popularity_score FROM PopularEvents WHERE popularity_score >= 80;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM TicketSales WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY sales_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_name, revenue FROM EventRevenue WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT event_name, popularity_score FROM PopularEvents WHERE event_type = 'Concert' ORDER BY event_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM BusinessDecisions WHERE decision_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY decision_id DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM Reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 5;
